sentences.en: All forms of botulism can be fatal and are considered medical emergencies.
sentences.cn: 各种肉毒杆菌中毒都可以致命,都被认为是医疗上的紧急情况.

sentences.en: BPA helps protect food products from spoiling and causing botulism.
sentences.cn: 双酚A有助于避免食品腐坏,造成肉毒中毒.

sentences.en: Don't taste the food; even a small amount can cause botulism.
sentences.cn: 不要尝这食物; 即使稍微尝点也会引起肉毒中毒.

sentences.en: Given the other possible diagnoses, botulism was our best - case scenario.
sentences.cn: 与其他可能的诊断相比, 肉毒杆菌中毒是最符合事实的情况.

sentences.en: Honey can't be used in children under 1, due to risk of infantile botulism.
sentences.cn: 因为有婴儿肉毒杆菌中毒的危险,蜂蜜不能用于1岁以下的婴儿.

sentences.en: I didn't know that it is actually the botulism bacteria ? a toxin? extracted from spoiled food.
sentences.cn: 我以前不知道肉毒 杆菌 原来是从腐烂食物中提炼出来的一种毒素.

sentences.en: It is concluded that the cause of death in this case was botulism rather than hepatocirrhosis.
sentences.cn: 本病例死因应为细菌性食物中毒而非肝硬化.

sentences.en: Most cases are due to Bacteria ( including salmonella and staphylococcus ) and their toxins ( including Botulism ).
sentences.cn: 大多数急性食物中毒病例是由于细菌 ( 包括沙门氏菌属和葡萄球菌属 ) 及其毒性产物 ( 如肉毒中毒 ) 引起.

sentences.en: The symptoms botulism are so severe, consumers must not take chances, officials said.
sentences.cn: 患病后的症状极重, 消费者不要尝试.官员说.

sentences.en: This makes canned pumpkin a place where the bacteria that causes botulism food poisoning can grow.
sentences.cn: 这就会使罐装的南瓜产生一种波特林病毒,可导致食物中毒.

words.tran_cn: 腊肠杆菌；[毒物] 肉毒毒素

trans.tran_cn: 罐头食品中毒，肉毒中毒，肉毒杆菌中毒
trans.tran_en: serious food poisoning caused by  bacteria  in preserved meat and vegetables
